name: Hackathons
subtitle: Organizer, Treasurer, Mentor, Participant
description: Current treasurer of the executive board for Hack.UVA, on which I handle finances, contact potential sponsors, and organize caterers. I have participated in 8 hackathons — PilotDC 2014, PilotDC 2015, HackTJ 2015, HackUMBC 2016, Bitcamp 2016, MLH Prime Spring 2016, YHacks 2016, and MHacks Nano 2017. I have mentored 2 middle school hackathons — FirstHack 2016 and HackCL 2016 — leading an App Inventor workshop in HackCL.

name: Natural Language Processing Seminar/Research
subtitle: Student
description: Exploring natural language processing and deep learning with other students, ranging from undergrad to PhD. Being a part of this research group entails weekly meetings for delving into new papers and technologies. On my own, I have been listening to online machine learning and natural language processing lectures (Coursera and Stanford) and have been programming small projects along the way.

name: Music Program
subtitle: Chief Technology Officer | Principal Trumpet
description: Elected Chief Technology Officer of Cavalier Symphony Orchestra (CSO), for which I am developing a website. As well, I play trumpet in CSO and in the First Year Players pit orchestra. I have played trumpet for ten years now.

name: Rubik's Cube Club
subtitle: Co-President/Team Member
description: Elected co-president as four-year member of the club. I recruited members, developed the website, and maintained the mailing list. Additionally, I participated on the competitive team that solved 25 cubes in national record time.

name: STEMBassadors
subtitle: Math Tutor
description: Tutored math for Holmes Middle School sixth grade students considered at risk of failing the state mandated math exam.
